content.rendered:
Posts


Named Account Model Implementation: Part 1 – Before We Begin

Implementation of a Named Account Model is a large undertaking. It can be stressful for even the most experienced admin, but it doesn’t have to be. This post reviews the concept of what a named account model is and high level requirements before planning your project.

Read Post


Named Account Implementation Part 2 – Building Your List

After planning your implementation, the next step is to build your list. Read Part 2 to learn how to select the right companies for your named account list for the best results.

Read Post

Named Account Implementation Part 3 – Get it Done

COMING SOON!  Ideas, Best Practices, and recommendations for features and functionality to implement

Resources

Documents and templates to help you with your Named Account Implementation

excerpt.rendered: Named Account Model how to design and implement in Salesforce

jetpack-related-posts.title: Automation Hour 2021: Einstein Bot Flows &  Omni-Channel Routing
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Curious about Einstein Bots, Flow, or the new Omni-Channel Routing functionality? In this episode of Automation Hour, you'll learn about AI and all of that inside of Salesforce from Technical Architect & Salesforce MVP, Meighan Brodkey.
